page_content:
Capgemini UK plc

Physical Security Service

Capgemini works with clients to understand their risk management strategy and appetite, providing a range of physical security services leveraging our experience drawn from a wide cross-section of clients and supplier engagements. We can help clients assess their physical security vulnerabilities and risks for clients’ enterprise and cloud services environments.

Features

  • Security Check (SC) and Developed Vetting (DV) cleared Security professionals
  • Can provide Scoping interviews for developing of physical security strategy
  • Help with devising and conducting Risk Assessments & Gap Analysis
  • Can provide detailed threat analysis to determine key threats
  • Can provide assessments of physical controls (as agreed)
  • Can provide reviews of findings, production of reports with recommended-actions
  • Can provide monitoring and support for progression of recommended actions
  • Can provide testing of implemented controls, where agreed and appropriate
  • Can help protection of information assets through sustainable security solutions
  • Can use agreed industry good practice methodologies tailored for client

Benefits

  • Can help provide enterprise and cloud services physical security strategy
  • Can help provide assurance that Physical Security matches business needs
  • Can help clients assess their 3rd-party suppliers’ physical security
  • Can help enable reductions in Security Incidents and mitigation costs
  • Can help provide a balanced security provision protecting against threats
  • Can help clients assess the physical security of cloud services
  • Can help clients assess where their physical security vulnerabilities are
  • Can help clients prioritise physical security vulnerabilities and risks
  • Can help clients develop mitigation plans for physical security vulnerabilities
  • Can help clients plan for meeting their compliance needs

Pricing

£397.0 per person

  • Excluding VAT
  • Minimum contract period: Day
